official_title: To designate the Provasoli-Guillard Center for the Culture of Marine Phytoplankton as a National Center and Facility.

summary.text: Designates the Provasoli-Guillard Center for the Culture of Marine Phytoplankton in West Boothbay Harbor, Maine, as a National Center and Facility.
